                    "_id": "da78c945a411da2823fe6c5c276dacabe71e78a204c3f73cd42f85f2e972188f",
                    "copy": "Payment plans available on approved credit for iPhone and Apple{%nbsp%}Watch purchases over $99, Mac purchases over $199 and iPad purchases over $199. Offer valid on qualifying purchases of eligible Apple products, at Apple{%nbsp%}Store locations, :[apple.com/ca]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"internal\"%}), on the Apple{%nbsp%}Store app and by calling :[ :[1800MYAPPLE]({%url metadata=\"2\" destination-type=\"external\"%})]({%wj%}). Financing provided by Affirm, and all transactions are subject to approval. Financing offers may vary from time to time and may be amended or cancelled at any time. See :[apple.com/ca/shop/browse/financing]({%url metadata=\"3\" destination-type=\"internal\"%}) for more information. Quebec residents: Learn more about financing{%nbsp%}:[here]({%url metadata=\"3\" destination-type=\"internal\"%}).{%br%}{%br%}7.99% APR Representative example based on $1,099 purchase: Total repayment amount of $1,192.79 paid over 24 monthly payments of $49.70 at 7.99% APR.               "headline": {
                "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_CA/ipad/content/ipad-family/icon-card-section/trade-in/headline",
                "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                "textType": "markdown",
                "metadata": [],
                "_id": "2546fb89f8d2df8e01483eea7178bb42e61aacccaf61981177b3b0b0a9f2fd8a",
                "copy": "Save :[up to {%pricing id=\"slug:family_ipad_pro\" template=\"credit.display.smart\" type=\"tradein\"%}]({%pricing-fallback id=\"slug:family_ipad_pro\" type=\"tradein\" collapse=\"true\"%}) with Apple Trade{%nbsp%}In.",
                "_meta": []
              },
              "bodyCopy": {
                "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_CA/ipad/content/ipad-family/icon-card-section/trade-in/body-copy",
                "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                "textType": "markdown",
                "metadata": [
                  "40ebcf740efe0d108c2fdb1eaf001fac09e0a0b48de0a71e24442cb4e57370fd"
                ],
                "_id": "f0b216ce22d968da0c47f70db61a2adcfef404d991c78fd63e3f7557bd6fc07a",
                "copy": "Get credit towards your next iPad when you trade in an eligible device.{%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"1\"%}",
                "_meta": [
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_CA/global-legal/trade-in/trade-in",
                    "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                    "textType": "markdown",
                    "categories": [
                      "legal"
                    ],
                    "metadata": [],
                    "_id": "40ebcf740efe0d108c2fdb1eaf001fac09e0a0b48de0a71e24442cb4e57370fd",
                    "copy": "Trade-in values will vary based on the condition, year and configuration of your eligible trade-in device. Not all devices are eligible for credit. You must be at least the age of majority to be eligible to trade in for credit or for an :[Apple Gift Card.]({%wj%}) Trade-in value will be applied toward qualifying new device purchase or added to an Apple Gift Card.:[]({%wj%}) Actual value awarded is based on receipt of a qualifying device matching the description provided when estimate was made. Sales tax will be assessed on full value of a new device purchase. In-store trade-in requires presentation of a valid photo ID (local law may require saving this information). Offer may not be available in all stores and may vary between in-store and online trade-in. Some stores may have additional requirements. Apple or its trade-in partners reserve the right to refuse, cancel or limit quantity of any trade-in transaction for any reason. More details are available from Apples trade-in partner for trade-in and recycling of eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply."
                  }
                ]
              },

                      "copy": "Get trade-in credit for your new device.",
                      "_meta": []
                    },
                    "inlineHeader": {
                      "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_CA/ipad/content/ipad-family/icon-card-section/trade-in/modal/inline-header",

                      "textType": "markdown",
                      "metadata": [
                        "40ebcf740efe0d108c2fdb1eaf001fac09e0a0b48de0a71e24442cb4e57370fd"
                      ],
                      "_id": "4ac34e17beb0e2b6ba19ba3f7758d0b1c9077d4403dd5cef441563f98b02b543",
                      "copy": "Just add a trade-in when you choose a new product. Once your device has been received and verified, well apply the value of your current model to your payment method. Terms apply.{%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"1\"%}",
                      "_meta": [
                        {
                          "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_CA/global-legal/trade-in/trade-in",
                          "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                          "textType": "markdown",
                          "categories": [
                            "legal"
                          ],
                          "metadata": [],
                          "_id": "40ebcf740efe0d108c2fdb1eaf001fac09e0a0b48de0a71e24442cb4e57370fd",
                          "copy": "Trade-in values will vary based on the condition, year and configuration of your eligible trade-in device. Not all devices are eligible for credit. You must be at least the age of majority to be eligible to trade in for credit or for an :[Apple Gift Card.]({%wj%}) Trade-in value will be applied toward qualifying new device purchase or added to an Apple Gift Card.:[]({%wj%}) Actual value awarded is based on receipt of a qualifying device matching the description provided when estimate was made. Sales tax will be assessed on full value of a new device purchase. In-store trade-in requires presentation of a valid photo ID (local law may require saving this information). Offer may not be available in all stores and may vary between in-store and online trade-in. Some stores may have additional requirements. Apple or its trade-in partners reserve the right to refuse, cancel or limit quantity of any trade-in transaction for any reason. More details are available from Apples trade-in partner for trade-in and recycling of eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply."
                        }

                          "_id": "5a1778e7972b2628f2beb4ea5d13f12921ea2deece326fa88863a34464800d44",
                          "copy": "The latest iPad{%nbsp%}Pro, iPad{%nbsp%}Air and iPad{%nbsp%}mini models are built for Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence, which helps you write, express yourself and get things done effortlessly.{%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"1\"%} With groundbreaking privacy protections, it gives you peace of mind that no one else can access your data{%nbsp%} not even{%nbsp%}Apple.",

                          "copy": "Communicate across languages.",

                        },
                        "copy": {

                          "metadata": [
                            "82a613adfee58c44627905cb0d08f137bb2706f16c22e3343ba02c037cac4359",
                            "f8cc23a5a9ebba87e8424d5671bb860fcbe9171f9e53eb939e07d9e802e7b003"
                          ],
                          "_id": "fcdd83509b2cf9c3ab28bea402a513621f329a824a2c89745335905b5d1ba137",
                          "copy": "Turn on Live{%nbsp%}Translation to automatically translate texts in Messages,{%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"1\"%} display live translated captions in FaceTime and get spoken translations for calls in the Phone{%nbsp%}app.{%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"2\"%}",
                          "_meta": [
                            {
                              "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_CA/ipad/content/legal/tech-specs-and-features/apple-intelligence/live-translation",
                              "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                              "textType": "markdown",
                              "categories": [
                                "legal"
                              ],
                              "metadata": [],
                              "_id": "82a613adfee58c44627905cb0d08f137bb2706f16c22e3343ba02c037cac4359",
                              "copy": "Live{%nbsp%}Translation in Messages is available in Chinese (Simplified), English (UK, U.S.), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), and Spanish (Spain) when Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence is enabled on a compatible iPhone, iPad, or Mac, as well as on Apple{%nbsp%}Watch{%nbsp%}Series{%nbsp%}9 and later, Apple{%nbsp%}Watch{%nbsp%}Ultra{%nbsp%}2 and later and Apple{%nbsp%}Watch{%nbsp%}SE{%nbsp%}3 when paired with an Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence-enabled iPhone."
                            },
                            {
                              "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_CA/ipad/content/legal/tech-specs-and-features/apple-intelligence/live-translation-phone",
                              "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                              "textType": "markdown",
                              "categories": [
                                "legal"
                              ],
                              "metadata": [],
                              "_id": "f8cc23a5a9ebba87e8424d5671bb860fcbe9171f9e53eb939e07d9e802e7b003",
                              "copy": "Live{%nbsp%}Translation in Phone and FaceTime is available for one-on-one calls in English (UK, U.S.), French (France), German, Portuguese (Brazil) and Spanish (Spain) when Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence is enabled on a compatible iPhone, iPad or{%nbsp%}Mac."
                            }
                          ]
                        },

                "_id": "3e8dc90ca8d9d92935fbffd76d592a4d1c2d3633a41fe8ad1ac3c1638574eea7",
                "copy": "iPad and Mac are designed to work together to form the ultimate creative setup. Sketch on your iPad and have it appear instantly on your Mac with Sidecar. Then use your iPad for drawing or editing with Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil or as a second display. Extend your workflow to new places, and when you return to your desk Universal Control allows you to use one mouse or trackpad seamlessly across both devices.",

                "copy": "iPad is a great way to optimize your workouts while tracking your progress on Apple{%nbsp%}Watch. See personal metrics from Apple{%nbsp%}Watch integrated on the screen of your iPad in real time. The sensors in Apple{%nbsp%}Watch combine with advanced algorithms to provide data that keeps you motivated. And see it all come together on your Health app on{%nbsp%}iPad.",

          "content": {
            "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_CA/ipad/composition/ipad-family-items/ribbon-section-items/holiday-idl",
            "_model": "ribbon",
            "_modelname": "RibbonModel",
            "title": "Holiday FY26 IDL",
            "copy": {
              "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_CA/ipad/content/ipad-family/ribbon-section/holiday-idl/copy",
              "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
              "textType": "markdown",
              "metadata": [
                "3d5e3ce13befc96300061b051d2792ae02017a62a78f488658e78d72ada7de0e"
              ],
              "_id": "10a808abe98bca365d2e6617b19380039cfeff61662f958e39b040677301f528",
              "copy": "Get gifts in time for the holidays with free two-hour delivery on eligible products{%nbsp%} now{%nbsp%}through{%nbsp%}12/24.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}",
              "_meta": [
                {
                  "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_CA/global-legal/delivery/delivery-offer",
                  "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                  "textType": "markdown",
                  "categories": [
                    "legal"
                  ],
                  "metadata": [
                    "dd0c867516f86824968840db989819c3d574f2ea70c712c53d3fa74f833d698f"
                  ],
                  "_id": "3d5e3ce13befc96300061b051d2792ae02017a62a78f488658e78d72ada7de0e",
                  "copy": "$0 twohour delivery on purchases made from December 20, 2025, through December 24, 2025, on eligible Apple products in most metros. Offer applies to in{%nbhyp%}stock purchase(s) of iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple{%nbsp%}Watch, AirPods, Apple{%nbsp%}TV and Beats only. Offer is not available on customized Mac, engraved products, and for certain order types including orders paid for with financing or by bank transfer. Delivery times vary according to your selected delivery address, availability of your items and the time of day you place your order. :[Find a store]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"internal\"%}) to view local store hours or see checkout for estimated delivery. A signature is required for delivery."
                },
                {
                  "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_CA/global-legal/legal-urls/retail",
                  "_model": "plain-text-copy",
                  "textType": "plainText",
                  "metadata": [],
                  "_id": "dd0c867516f86824968840db989819c3d574f2ea70c712c53d3fa74f833d698f",
                  "copy": "/ca/retail"
                }
              ]
            },
            "link": {

children.label: copy
children.value: Trade-in values will vary based on the condition, year and configuration of your eligible trade-in device. Not all devices are eligible for credit. You must be at least the age of majority to be eligible to trade in for credit or for an :[Apple Gift Card.]({%wj%}) Trade-in value will be applied toward qualifying new device purchase or added to an Apple Gift Card.:[]({%wj%}) Actual value awarded is based on receipt of a qualifying device matching the description provided when estimate was made. Sales tax will be assessed on full value of a new device purchase. In-store trade-in requires presentation of a valid photo ID (local law may require saving this information). Offer may not be available in all stores and may vary between in-store and online trade-in. Some stores may have additional requirements. Apple or its trade-in partners reserve the right to refuse, cancel or limit quantity of any trade-in transaction for any reason. More details are available from Apples trade-in partner for trade-in and recycling of eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply.

children.label: copy
children.value: Made for the large Multi-Touch display, iPadOS delivers game-changing capabilities that make iPad incredibly powerful and easy to use. The Liquid Glass design brings a stunning look and more vitality to everything you see  and touch.

children.label: copy
children.value: iPad Pro, front exterior, landscape orientation, displayed with photo editing app featuring detailed robot blueprints and handwritten annotations, multiple design stages, tiled over Photos Library, Downloads folder preview fanned out overlaid on display

children.label: copy
children.value: An intuitive, flexible windowing system makes it easy to manage all your apps and switch between them exactly the way you like. Open more windows at once, and resize and arrange them to suit your workflow.

children.label: copy
children.value: iPad Pro, front exterior, silver colour, attached to Magic Keyboard in landscape orientation, white colour, all connected to external Studio Display. iPad Pro display with graphic design app, vibrant colours and text, Studio Display showing various apps and a 3D model

children.value: Over a million other ways to use it.

children.label: copy
children.value: Turn your iPad into almost anything  from a math classroom or workstation to a professional recording studio  with apps from the App{%nbsp%}Store. With over a million apps made just for iPad, theres something for everyone.

children.label: copy
children.value: 5 iPad Pro devices, Apple Pencil Pro, front exterior, showcasing different apps and features including Adobe Illustrator, Procreate, Final Cut Pro and GarageBand, displays showing photo editing app editing an article, video editing app with a picture of a model in a blue coat and black and white printed pants, colour adjustment panel open on with various video effects and sliders and timeline, a rendering of a bionic hand with photo editing tools open, abstract photo of a model being edited, a song being edited in Garage Band

children.label: copy
children.value: iPadOS is the operating system that lets you touch, type and draw on one magical device. With tons of apps for iPad, theres something for everyone.

children.label: copy
children.value: An underwater scene created in Image Playground, a new Apple Intelligence feature with Notes in the background

children.label: copy
children.value: The latest iPad{%nbsp%}Pro, iPad{%nbsp%}Air and iPad{%nbsp%}mini models are built for Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence, which helps you write, express yourself and get things done effortlessly.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%} With groundbreaking privacy protections, it gives you peace of mind that no one else can access your data{%nbsp%} not even{%nbsp%}Apple.

children.label: copy
children.value: Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence is available in beta. Some features may not be available in all regions or languages. For feature and language availability and system requirements, see :[support.apple.com/121115]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="appleExternal"%}).

children.label: copy
children.value: iPad Pro, front exterior, display showing home screen with flexible windowing, various app icons in custom arrangement, including FaceTime, Files, Reminders, Maps, Home, Camera, App Store, Books, Podcasts, TV, News and Shortcuts, widgets including weather forecast for Toronto, a recent photo of someone swimming, and a 2-day calendar snapshot, Dock with icons for Notes, Music, Calendar and more

children.label: copy
children.value: Turn on Live{%nbsp%}Translation to automatically translate texts in Messages,{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%} display live translated captions in FaceTime and get spoken translations for calls in the Phone{%nbsp%}app.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="2"%}

children.label: copy
children.value: Live{%nbsp%}Translation in Messages is available in Chinese (Simplified), English (UK, U.S.), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), and Spanish (Spain) when Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence is enabled on a compatible iPhone, iPad, or Mac, as well as on Apple{%nbsp%}Watch{%nbsp%}Series{%nbsp%}9 and later, Apple{%nbsp%}Watch{%nbsp%}Ultra{%nbsp%}2 and later and Apple{%nbsp%}Watch{%nbsp%}SE{%nbsp%}3 when paired with an Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence-enabled iPhone.

children.label: copy
children.value: Live{%nbsp%}Translation in Phone and FaceTime is available for one-on-one calls in English (UK, U.S.), French (France), German, Portuguese (Brazil) and Spanish (Spain) when Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence is enabled on a compatible iPhone, iPad or{%nbsp%}Mac.

children.value: With an all-new design, richer language understanding, and expansive product knowledge about your devices, Siri is more helpful than ever.

children.label: copy
children.value: Designed to protect your privacy at every step.

children.label: copy
children.value: With Private Cloud Compute, Apple{%nbsp%}Intelligence can draw on larger Apple-designed server-based models, running on Apple{%nbsp%}silicon, to handle more complex requests while protecting your privacy.

children.label: copy
children.value: iPad is built for Apple Intelligence. It helps you write, express yourself and get things done effortlessly with groundbreaking privacy protections.

children.label: copy
children.value: Your workplace can be any place.

children.label: copy
children.value: Theres never been a more joyful way of getting stuff done than with iPad. Designed for Multi-Touch, simple gestures help you get around smoothly and quickly. Add an Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil to write and draw your ideas or attach a keyboard to rip through your inbox.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%} And do it all with the game-changing performance of Apple silicon.{%nbsp%}

children.value: Left: iPad Pro, front exterior, landscape orientation, space black colour, display with multiple app screens including Notes, Calendar and Music, with the dock at the bottom showing app icons, right: iPad Pro, front exterior, landscape orientation, space black colour, display showing recipes and calendar

children.label: copy
children.value: Connect with family, friends and your team wherever you go. Speedy Wi-Fi lets you download, upload and transfer whatever documents, folders and files you need from just about anywhere. And with 5G, you can stay connected even when youre away from Wi{%nbhyp%}Fi.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

children.label: copy
children.value: Data plan required. 5G is available in select markets and through select carriers. Speeds vary based on site conditions and carrier. For details on 5G support, contact your carrier and see :[apple.com/ca/ipad/cellular]({%url metadata="1" destination-type="internal"%}).

children.label: copy

children.label: copy
children.value: Work from anywhere with iPad. Connect with friends, family and your team wherever you are. Add Apple Pencil or attach a keyboard and do even more.

children.value: Take your inner artist{%br%}out and about.

children.label: copy
children.value: Take your inner artist out and{%nbsp%}about.

copy.copy: With a fully immersive touchscreen, iPad is a canvas thats ready for you to express your most creative self. From 3D sculpting and composing a beat to painting a masterpiece in Adobe Fresco, iPad is where your most creative ideas come to life.

alt.copy: Two iPad devices and an iPad Air featuring FlipaClip, Adobe Fresco and GarageBand apps

heading.copy: Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil is the ultimate creative tool.

copy.copy: Apple{%nbsp%}Pencil lets you easily sketch a new idea in Notes, finish a watercolour in Procreate or draw up production-ready architectural plans in SketchUp.{%sosumi type="numbered" metadata="1"%}

alt.copy: An iPad Air showcasing a Procreate drawing that's spreading out into the background

heading.copy: Take your best shot. And video.

copy.copy: iPad has powerful front and back cameras that allow you to create feature films, high-quality photos and other amazing content. Apps like Final{%nbsp%}Cut{%nbsp%}Pro and Adobe{%nbsp%}Lightroom let you shoot, edit and share  all from one portable device.
